title: India vs New Zealand live stream: how to watch 2nd Test cricket online from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: Can India triumph over arch Test cricket rivals in Mumbai?
article: The Black Caps showed spirit in holding India to a dramatic and unlikely draw in their first Test, extending their unbeaten Test streak to 10. The world's top-ranked Test side has one final chance to register a win on this tour, so read on as we explain how to watch an India vs New Zealand live stream and catch all the cricket action online no matter where you are in the world.

Talisman Virat Kohli is back in India's XI for this one at the expense of stand-in captain Ajinkya Rahane, while the visitors' go without Kane Williamson for this decider after he was sidelined with an elbow niggle.

At Kanpur, tailender Ajaz Patel and debutant Rachin Ravindra dug in to frustrate India and give New Zealand a platform to build on, the duo withstanding 52 balls to deny the hosts what had looked like certain victory.
However, the visiting team are going to have to adjust better to the conditions if they're to stand a chance of beating India in Mumbai.

The 1st Test was India's to lose, and they allowed it to slip. Anything other than a victory here would feel like a defeat at the end of a series in which they've been so dominant. But the good news is that they're set to welcome back their talisman Virat Kohli - can he lead them to an avenging win over the recently crowned Test champions.

We're preparing for a thrilling deciding Test match in this mini series, so follow our guide for all the details you need to find a reliable India vs New Zealand live stream and watch the 2nd Test online from anywhere.
In India, New Zealand, the UK, Australia or the US? We've got you covered with your official broadcasting options below.
